entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14 except minus 18 near the Saskatchewan border.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14 except minus 18 near the Saskatchewan border. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6 except minus 10 near the Saskatchewan border.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6 except minus 10 near the Saskatchewan border. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
